description: Moves a potentially malicious binary to a secure quarantine directory (/var/ossec/quarantine), removes execute permissions, and records detailed metadata including original path, quarantine path, and SHA256 hashes before and after quarantine. Produces structured NDJSON output for forensic analysis and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback if locked.

script_parameters.name: FilePath
script_parameters.description: Full path to the suspected malicious binary to quarantine.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: LogMaxKB
script_parameters.description: Maximum size of the log file (KB) before rotation.

script_parameters.name: LogKeep
script_parameters.description: Number of rotated log files to keep.
